name: WiFi Signal Strength Meter
description: This app is a simple tool that allows you to view your current WiFi connection signal strength. Its useful in finding good areas of WiFi connectivity in your WiFi network.   Easy to find the best WiFi signal Strength   The app is constantly updating the signal strength so you can walk around your house, work, or anywhere your connected to WiFi to find the best connection.   If you want the app support your language, please help us translate from English to your language by access the link below. Thank you! https://goo.gl/9vAB8R   If you like this app, please take a moment to rate us. Thank you!
